description:
These boxers are made to move. The semi-compressive nylon blend provides firm support and has plenty of stretch so you're free to move. The HD version has an upgraded, articulated front pouch that stabilizes the boys, while preventing unwanted friction.

  • Breathable micro-mesh nylon and spandex wicks moisture and is quick to dry
  • Anti-microbial treatment controls odor
  • Seamless on the inside front to prevent irritation and reduce chafing
  • Wide, no-fold waistband wicks and stays dry
  • Ballpark Pouch provides support and stability
  • Parallel side panels offer a barrier between one's package and inner thigh
  • Semi-compression fit hugs the body without being restrictive
  • 5in. inseam
name: Saxx Kinetic HD Boxer Briefs - Men's
